reviews.sentence: 3 star hotel at 5 star prices. Hotel was ok but definitely not worth the 300 night it cost. Room was average and in need of an update. Room was on level 2 and was noisy because of the street outside.

Outdated room and facilities lots of better choices nearby. Location 30 meter to Chatswod station is probably the only good thing about this place. Room and Facilities very outdated kitchen has everything you need to cook and utensils but I doubt people are here to cook. Hallway carpet needs a refresh. Cold and robotic services.

Uncomfortable beds maintenance issues. Very uncomfortable beds. Sagy hammocks. Maintenance issues with TVs and heating not working properly. Shelves not attached properly to walls. This hotel is in such a great location less than 100 metres from the train station and eat street. But I would not stay again so disappointing to have such an uncomfortable bed in what is for us a splurge hotel.
Need some work to modernise. quite rundown rooms. lucky the front desk changed me to another run. slightly better condition.

Good but the hotel needs renovation. Some staffs were polite and helpful. The location of the hotel is very good close to train station and there are some big shopping malls and many different restaurants. The hotel needs renovation cos the exterior and interior are too old. Will choose this hotel as accommodation when visiting Sydney next time.
In desperate need of an update. The hotel itself was disappointing the rooms were shabby and were in desperate need of renovation. The staff were friendly and helpful.

Renovation makes you high. The hotel is undergoing renovation as soon as I step in the room smells paint thinner. I stayed 2 nights there. The strong paint will transfer to your clothes as well. I advice if you have kids stay out until the hotel finish all those pint jobs. Location wise is good. Customer service is superb.

Convenient. Clean accommodation and friendly staff. No information on pool maintenance was advertised on bokingcom web site. Staff did make effort to accommodate by giving access to pool in alternative hotel. This was welcome but the closure of the pool did have a big impact on our stay as it was the primary reason we booked the hotel.

overall experience good breakfast poor. Breakfast very disappointing. In particular hot buffet served early and not refilled or refreshed. Eating later than 8 am meant sparse or no eggs mushrooms or sausages remaining. and if any they were dried out and unappetising.

Suitable for short stays. The hotel is quite nice and the renovation is coming along nicely with my recent stay in a new refurbished room. I am happy with the refurbishment up to the bathroom. Having a shower over bath is an extreme annoyance for me as it is hard to have a decent shower. I have a dodgy ankle with a large metal plate to hold it together and having a slippery shower over bath is something that really concerns me. Everything else is nice and comfortable. The room service menu is average and suitable.

It gives me a good memory when I stayed in Chatswod. The renovated modern style of the room. The style is simple and practical. Fortunately it is not luxurious which I do not like. The staff is very helpful. The hotel is very near the Chatswod train station. Lots of shops and restaurants near the hotel. Canot think of anything.

Comfortable stay in very convenient location. Have stayed here several times. Was impressed with our very spacious refurbished room. Quality fittings only let down by dated toilet and cistern perhaps due to request for easy accessibility. Disappointing limited internet quota.

Ideal stay for Business. My first stay with Mantra did not disappoint. Well appointed room with all the amenities needed great layout and fresh modern style made the stay refreshing. Love that they are updating the lobby area car parking was a breeze super close to the train station and eating precinct made my overnight stay perfect.

Quiet and Beautifully renovated room. We will definitely be staying here again. Our room was quiet and stylish with a fully functional and renovated kitchen. Staff were also friendly and helpful. The location was ideal as it was directly opposite the train station shops and restaurants.

Perfect. Staff were fantastic as was the restaurant food. Location was perfect close to everything. Apartments were nice and newly renovated so very clean. Would defiantly recommend. and hope to say again soon.

Acceptable room but air conditioner does not work. The room was nicely renovated and was clean. The air conditioner though is a joke. It works more like a fan and can not cool the bedroom and living area simultaneously its 2019.
Comfortable and convenient. We were very comfortable in our refurbished room. Some negatives regarding the room but overall we enjoyed our stay.
Loved the renovations. All ways stay at the Mantra. Always the best for location service and now the updates to the rooms it makes it a very nice place to stay.

Great location but need to lift their maintenance game. Location was great it was clean and staff were great. Pool facilities ware under maintenance and not made aware at time of booking. Fridge in our room was n’t working.
